title: Do you call the Navy the USS Teag First Betis after the online vote?
subtitle: An article that made fun of the fact that an online naming contest resulted in the Navy naming of the "USS Tig Ol Bities," but it was just ironic.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: The U.S. Navy announced that it was baptizing the USS Tig Ol Bitties after a vote on the Internet.
